Showstarter.name: Showstarter
Showstarter.desc:
Cyan and yellow glasses.
Wearing those gives a strange sense of dread and comfort combined.

FrostKnife.name: FrostKnife
FrostKnife.desc:
A cyan knife.
Touching it makes you feel like it's snowing...

NightmareKnife.name: NightmareKnife
NightmareKnife.desc:
A red knife.
Holding it makes you feel like you're burning...

Puppet Strings.name: Puppet Strings
Puppet Strings.desc: A bunch of strings that can be attached to someone to increase their magic.

Crash Hammer.name: Crash Hammer
Crash Hammer.desc:
A hammer with a pattern resembling a blue screen.
Hopefully you don't crash while using this...
